context: Metropolis Healthcare is a multinational diagnostic lab chain headquartered in Mumbai, with over 124 clinical laboratories and 2400 collection centers across 7 countries. As a Data Science Intern, I worked with the marketing and R&D teams to improve revenue insights and enhance user experience on the mobile platform.
objectives: Cleaned and organized over 2 million rows of marketing data (vaccinations, diagnostics) spanning 4 months to improve data quality.
Analyzed monthly revenue trends using SQL and Tableau to identify anomalies and propose purchase optimization strategies.
Conducted research and ideated an AI-powered in-app chatbot to improve customer navigation and satisfaction.
Designed chatbot flow to collect user info, recommend diagnostic tests, and provide next steps using LLM + RAG architecture.
Helped achieve a 20% increase in customer satisfaction (based on employee feedback) during the chatbot prototype phase.
